summary: Animate elements, or sub elements to a container. You can choose from multiple predefined effects, defined by the styleguide. All animations in done with anime-js.

description.js-bind: Event to bind on (onload = init animation, scroll = in view animation)
description.js-animate-target: A sub element of the bound target, if left blank bound target will be animated. The target element is automatically prefixed by the dom-node of the bound element.
description.js-animate-stagger: Stagger (delay) each item in list of items (ms). Use 0 or false to turn off staggering.
